declarations.name: DrawerDialog
declarations.description: A custom element for a dialog with drawer-like behavior.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Reflects the open state of the dialog. When present, the dialog is visible.

properties.name: open
properties.description: Indicates whether the dialog is open.

slots.description: Default slot for content inside the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-border-radius
cssProperties.description: The border radius of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-block-size
cssProperties.description: The block size of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-inline-size
cssProperties.description: The inline size of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-max-inline-size
cssProperties.description: The maximum inline size of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-inset-block-start
cssProperties.description: The block start inset of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-inset-block-end
cssProperties.description: The block end inset of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-inset-inline-start
cssProperties.description: The inline start inset of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-inset-inline-end
cssProperties.description: The inline end inset of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-shadow
cssProperties.description: The box shadow of the dialog.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-backdrop-background
cssProperties.description: The background of the dialog's backdrop.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-backdrop-filter
cssProperties.description: The backdrop filter of the dialog's backdrop.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-transition-duration
cssProperties.description: The duration of the dialog's transitions.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-ease
cssProperties.description: The easing function for the dialog's transitions.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-dialog-transform-hide
cssProperties.description: The transform applied when the dialog is hidden.
